short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mugnsoft Record and Playback tool for ease of getting acquainted with Selenium WebDriver.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mugnsoft : SYNTHETIC MONITORING MADE SIMPLE AND EFFICIENT

Mugnsoft IDE is a Record and Playback tool that ease the development of Selenium scripts by recording your interactions with websites.
It helps:
— Automate the repetitive tasks on browsers, such as generating reports, filling forms, automating games, etc.
— Test your new features before handing your work over to the QA team
— Replay synthetic testing to monitor the functionality of web applications
— Ability to add transaction details in your Selenium scenarios
— Push directly the auto generated code to Mugnsoft component
— Exporting Selenium WebDriver scripts in various formats
— Integrating with other Mugnsoft solutions (Mugnsoft webserver and Mugnsoft monitor) for advanced test generation, reporting, and test orchestration needs

The recorded tests can be imported in Mugnsoft webserver and deployed on various Mugnsoft monitors. Mugnsoft is a synthetic monitoring software solution that helps you track any performance issue before they turn into incidents and problem.

* Useful links:

— Mugnsoft ide doc: https://doc-ide.mugnsoft.com
— Mugnsoft doc: https://doc.mugnsoft.com
